item.title: Harvad accuses Trump admin of manipulating evidence to revoke funding
item.description: Harvard claims the Trump administration manipulated records to justify revoking billions in funding, arguing the cuts threatened academic independence

media:content.media:title: Harvad accuses Trump admin of manipulating evidence to revoke funding
media:content.media:description: Harvard claims the Trump administration manipulated records to justify revoking billions in funding, arguing the cuts threatened academic independence

item.title: Body found on D4vd's impounded car indentified as missing teen girl
item.description: Authorities confirm the body discovered in D4vd’s impounded car was that of a missing teenage girl, as investigations continue.

item.title: House to vote on resolution honoring Charlie Kirk
item.description: Congress will vote on a resolution honoring Charlie Kirk’s life and condemning political violence, amid debate over the wording and bipartisan support.
